response: "I feel like I need to be perfect to fit in with society's standards."
"It's overwhelming trying to constantly meet everyone's expectations."
"I'm starting to lose myself in this quest for perfection."
"Why does society make us feel like we have to be flawless?"
"I'm tired of comparing myself to others and feeling like I'm not good enough."
"Sometimes I don't even know who I am anymore because I'm so focused on being perfect."
"I wish people would accept me for who I am instead of who they want me to be."
"It's hard to know what's real and what's just a facade when everyone is trying to be perfect."
"I'm starting to realize that perfection is an impossible standard and it's driving me crazy."
"I just want to be able to live my life without constantly worrying about being perfect."
